release.notes: D1 Removed Birthday Message code. Please accept my apologies.

developer.notes: D1 Added better error and log handling D2 Changed drop chance to handle less than 1 values. D3 Fixed exception caused by long names. D4 Paper 1.20.6 fixes D5 Fixing 1.20.6 disabling of custom wandering trader. D6 Testing new system for Custom Wandering Trader. D7 Adding more persistent data. D8 First 1.20.5 and 1.21 dev build. D9 Fixed some missed code. D10 MMHLib is back, added Armadillo and Wolf variants. D11 Cleaning up code, fixing broken commands, some commands removed. D12 Fixed numerical issue, added better file updater. D13 Added MiniBlocks and some code fixes. D14 Fixed reload command and fileVersion checker.
